snippet.title: Sorcery Saga: Curse of the Great Curry God Trailer
snippet.description:
Sorcery Story: Curse of the Great Curry God has been rated Teen (T) by the Electronic Software Ratings Board.  For more information, please visit: http://www.aksysgames.com/sorcery-saga/

Aksys Games announces that Sorcery Saga: Curse of the Great Curry God, a rogue-like dungeon crawler RPG for the PlayStation®Vita handheld entertainment system, will not only have a standard edition, but an absolutely delectable limited edition! Filled with a delightful assortment of goodies, Sorcery Saga: Curse of the Great Curry God "Hot and Spicy, Everything Nicey Limited Edition" set comes with a fully useable set of kitchenware, perfect for when you're making your own legendary meal! Look for both the Sorcery Saga: Curse of the Great Curry God Standard Edition and the "Hot and Spicy, Everything Nicey Limited Edition" at the end of the year, and spice up your holiday season with more than just eggnog!
